articles.title: Shein accused of selling childlike sex dolls in France - BBC
articles.description: The Asian fast fashion giant says it delisted the items "immediately" from its website and is investigating.

articles.title: Fruit sold in Kroger, other stores nationwide recalled due to potential contamination - WKRC
articles.description: Moonlight Companies has issued a nationwide recall of yellow and white peaches due to potential contamination with Listeria monocytogenes, according to the FDA.

articles.title: Doorbell video shows Colorado child refilling empty bowl with his own Halloween candy - CBS News
articles.description: A Colorado resident is hoping to reward a child they say refilled their candy bowl on Halloween after it was emptied.

articles.title: China to suspend some rare earth curbs, probes on U.S. chip firms - Fortune
articles.description: China will issue export licenses for rare earths, gallium, germanium, antimony and graphite “for the benefit of U.S. end users and their suppliers,” the White House said.

articles.title: Michael Dell points out practical advantage of Elon Musk’s proposed pay package - Teslarati
articles.description: As pointed out by the Dell Technologies CEO, Musk will only be rewarded if he delivers extraordinary value to shareholders

articles.title: Elon Musk wants you to know that Sam Altman got a refund for his Tesla Roadster - TechCrunch
articles.description: Elon Musk and Sam Altman are still taking swipes at each other on Musk’s social media platform X.

articles.title: What to know about the recall of atorvastatin pills for lowering cholesterol - PBS
articles.description: If you take cholesterol-lowering drugs called statins, you may have noticed a flurry of news coverage since late October about an extensive recall of thousands of bottles of atorvastatin, the generic version of Lipitor.

articles.title: 'Godfather of AI' says tech giants can't profit from their astronomical investments unless human labor is replaced - Fortune
articles.description: "I think the big companies are betting on it causing massive job replacement by AI, because that's where the big money is going to be."

articles.title: Penny haul of 70 pounds cashed in with Giant Eagle exchange - TribLIVE.com
Evolve Bank CEO fired after propositioning FBI agent who pretended to be a teen boy - CNBC
articles.description: In August, Evolve hired Hartheimer, who brought experience in financial regulatory matters, to help the bank recover from the collapse of startup Synapse.

articles.title: The Ranks of Corporate Zombies Are Growing: Credit Weekly - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: As Halloween monsters of all stripes flood neighborhoods in search of candy and parties this weekend, credit markets are seeing the resurgence of a different type of zombie.

articles.title: I Think These Are the 2 Best AI Stocks to Buy in November - The Motley Fool
articles.description: The AI infrastructure buildout has moved from speculation to reality, and two companies are positioned to capture the lion's share of spending.

articles.title: From fast food to beverage giants, brands see rising income inequality among customers - NBC News
articles.description: The K-shaped economy is changing consumer spending, and Chipotle, Coca Cola and McDonalds are trying to adapt.

articles.title: Verizon CEO sounds alarm on why customers are leaving in droves - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Verizon is struggling to shake a consumer trend that continues to grow legs, especially after the phone carrier issued several price hikes over the past year...

articles.title: Rising energy prices put AI and data centers in the crosshairs - TechCrunch
articles.description: A majority of consumers say they’re worried about data centers driving up electricity costs. Is the industry prepared for a possible backlash?

articles.title: The nation’s largest employers are putting their workers on notice - The Washington Post
articles.description: Amazon and Walmart are among firms warning employees of layoffs or disruption from AI as leaders across corporate America talk of increasing efficiency.

articles.title: Where the Nexperia auto chip crisis stands now as the U.S., China and EU race to contain fallout - CNBC
articles.description: The Nexperia crisis is still threatening vehicle production worldwide.

articles.title: Snohomish County resident first in state to be affected by nationwide listeria outbreak - KOMO
articles.description: A Snohomish County resident has been identified as part of a multistate outbreak of Listeria monocytogenes.

articles.title: United: Arriving flight at LaGuardia grazed parked plane, worsening Friday delays - Gothamist
articles.description: No one was injured, officials said

articles.title: Berkshire’s Quarterly Earnings Rise After Insurance Results Bounce Back - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: The conglomerate inches closer to Warren Buffett’s retirement as CEO with a record cash pile
